title: New Reading Material At TypeCulture
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20070923053459/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 4.Sep.2007 6.27pm 

—

TypeCulture has posted Laura Meseguer’s exceptional report on the design of her graduate project at the Royal Academy of Art in The Hague. The Design of Rumba: Concept and Process is an engaging documentation of the creation process behind an award-winning typeface family.

[http://www.typeculture.com/academic\_resource/articles\_essays/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070923053459/http:/www.typeculture.com/academic_resource/articles_essays/ "http://www.typeculture.com/academic\_resource/articles\_essays/")
author: Miss Tiffany
